hits.definition:
远 (F 遠)

[yuǎn] far

队 (F 隊)

[duì] team, (= 部队 bùduì) army, (= 队伍 duìwǔ) troops

跟

[gēn] heel, follow, with, and

带 (F 帶)

[dài] belt, zone, carry, bring, take

花

[huā] flower, spend; 花生 huāshēng peanut

快

[kuài] fast, sharp, (= 快乐 kuàilè, = 愉快 yúkuài) happy

权 (F 權)

[quán] right, power

该 (F 該)

[gāi] (= 应该 yīnggāi) should
